Now we have great new vehicles that are now on the market and I can't say this anymore but I used to say, you know, look at look at what's really making a difference in your world. Look at the types of systems, you know, we need you cannot get away from basic mechanics and um sometimes uh one might even feel like incremental tweaks within an existing infrastructure will get us there faster and much more effectively. Um and so we shouldn't we shouldn't just be attracted to the kind of academically exciting concepts but also have deep reverence for the the real workhorse kind of stuff um and train our students that that's okay, right? It doesn't always have to be new flashy ideas, sometimes we just have to make them much better.
